title: EMOTIONAL HYPNOTIC CRISIS / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS MASTERCLASS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret will demonstrate for us an incredible non-verbal hypnosis healing. A hypnotic crisis releases negative emotions and heals trauma. The subject experienced a powerful crisis and felt much better and freed up afterward. Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal techniques are extremely powerful and positive results are always achieved. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
